120238.「えーと 差出人は ロゼフ様で\n 配達先は グレン城の武器鍛冶ギルドにいる\n:
Let's see, the sender is Mr. Roseph and the
recipient is Guildmaster Rasedo at the
Weaponsmith Guild in Glen Castle, right?

120239.「ええ それで 間違いありませんわ。\n ありがとう。よろしく……:
Yes, that's definitely it. Thank you.
Pleasure...

120240.「<pc>さんっ！？\n いつから そこに……。:
<pc>! How long have you been
there...?

120241.「ラセドに頼まれて ロゼフに届け物を？\n ……そうだったの。:
Rasedo asked you to deliver something to
Roseph? Yes, I did.

120242.「お願い。ここで見たことは\n ラセドには 黙っていてください！\n ……これは:
Please. Please don't tell Rasedo what you saw
here! ...This is for that man's sake.

120243.「オレのため……ってのは\n どういうことなんだ シェイン。: What do you mean "for me..." Shane.

120245.「<pc>に ロゼフを探してくれと\n 頼んだが やはり ひと目 会いたくてよ。:
I asked <pc> to find Roseph, but I
still wanted to see him. I hurried to catch up
with him.

120246.「答えろ シェイン。\n どうして ロゼフの名前をかたって\n オレに 手紙なん:
Answer me Shane, why did you write to me in
Roseph's name?

120249.「……ラセド。私は あなたまで\n 失いたくなかったのよ。: I didn't want to lose you too.

120250.「光の河に落ちて 帰った者はいないわ。\n 悲しいけれど ロゼフは５年前に死んだ:
No one has ever fallen into the River of Light and returned. Sadly, Roseph died five years ago. And yet, you will always refuse to admit
it.

120251.「このままでは いずれ\n ロゼフを探すために 光の河へ降りて\n あなたまで死:
If this continues, eventually I will go down
to the River of Light to look for Roseph, and
even you will die. That's what I thought.

120252.「オレを 思い留まらせるために\n 偽の手紙を出して 安心させようとした。\n:
He tried to reassure me by sending a fake
letter to dissuade me. That's what this is
about...

120254.「もう ロゼフのことは忘れるよ……。\n 二度と 光の河にも行かねえ。:
I'll forget about Roseph now... I will never
go to River of Light again.

120255.「オレは 武器鍛冶ギルドに戻るわ。\n じゃあな シェイン。\n ……お前も 達:
I'm going back to the Weaponsmith Guild. Good-
bye Shane and good luck to you too.

120256.「私……あの人を助けるつもりで\n かえって キズつけてしまったんですね……。:
I...I was trying to save that person, but I
ended up hurting her...

120257.「<pc>さん。\n 厚かましい お願いかもしれませんが\n ラセドの様子を 見:
<pc>. I know this may be asking a
lot, but could you please go check on Rasedo?

120258.「お願いです。武器鍛冶ギルドに行き\n もし ラセドが 早まったことを\n する:
Please, if you go to the Weaponsmith Guild and
Rasedo tries to do something premature, please
stop him...

120260.「……シェイン。\n 心配して 来てくれたのかもしれねえが……\n 今は お前の:
Shane, you may have come here because you were
worried about me but I don't want to see your
face right now.

120262.「すみませーん。武器鍛冶ギルドの\n マスターさんに お願いがあるんですが。\n:
Excuse me, I have a request for the master of
the Weaponsmith Guild. Is he in the middle of
a bait-and-switch right now?

120263.「いや かまわねえぜ。\n どんな用件だい？: No, I don't mind. What can I do for you?

120264.「じつは この さんぞくのサーベルを\n 鍛え直してほしいんです。\n 長旅の間:
Actually, I need to have this Bandit Blade
reforged. It got a chip on it during a long
trip.

120265.「おう。お安い御用だぜ。見せてみな。: Oh. No problem. Let me see.

120267.「シェイン！ もう やめてくれっ！\n ロゼフのことは 忘れるって\n オレは: I told you I'd forget about Roseph!

120269.「お前のしわざじゃ ねえのか？\n なら この文字は……。:
You didn't do that, did you? Then these
letters...

120270.～いとしい息子 ロゼフへ\n 父 ラセド 母 シェインより～:
~To my sweet son Roseph from his father Rasedo
and mother Shane

120271.「な……なんですって！？ \n そんなこと あるわけないわ。\n 私 この手で:
What...what? That can't be true. I dropped it
into the River of Light with my own hands!

120273.「ああ……。この さんぞくのサーベルは\n 確かに <pc>が鍛えたものだ。\n:
Oh... This Bandit Blade was certainly forged
by <pc>. And my message is engraved
on it...

120274.「おいっ あんた！！\n この武器を 誰から手に入れたんだ！？: Hey, you! Who did you get this weapon from?

120276.「どこで……と言われても。\n 気がついたら 荒野に倒れていて\n 僕のそばに:
I'm not sure where.... I found myself lying in
the wilderness with this saber by my side.

120278.「あんた！ 名は なんと言うんだっ！\n もっと 顔をよく見せてくれ！！\n ど:
You! What's your name? Let me see your face!
Where are you from? Where were you born?

120279.「あの……すみません。\n 僕 昔のことは 何ひとつ覚えていなくて。\n 名前も:
Um...I'm sorry. I don't remember anything
about the past. I don't know my name or
hometown.

120280.「ですから 唯一の手がかりである\n この さんぞくのサーベルに刻まれた名前……:
Therefore, the name engraved on this Bandit
Blade, which is the only clue we have, is
Roseph.

120282.「そうよ……そうだわ。\n あの頃の面影があるもの……: Yes... yes. There's a shadow of those days...

120284.「……もしかして……あなたたちは\n 記憶をなくす前の僕を 知ってるんですか？\:
...Could it be...that you guys knew me before
I lost my memory? Come to think of it, I feel
nostalgic somehow...

120285.「ああ……。\n お帰り ロゼフ……。\n オレもシェインも ずっと待ってたぜ…:
Ah... Welcome back Roseph... Me and Shane have
been waiting for you...

120286.死んだと思われていた\nマスター・ラセドの息子\nロゼフは 生きていた……。:
Guildmaster Rasedo's son, Roseph, who was
thought to be dead, is alive...

120287.ロゼフは 改めて\nふたりに会いに来ると 約束し\n武器鍛冶ギルドから 去って行:
Roseph left the Weaponsmith Guild promising to
come back and see them again...

120288.「光の河へ落ちた\n 息子のロゼフは 生きていてくれた……。:
My son Roseph, who fell into the River of
Light, is alive...

120289.「そして シェインが 光の河へ落とした\n さんぞくのサーベルが ロゼフを\n:
And the Bandit Blade that Shane dropped into
the River of Light led Roseph to us.

120290.「ええ……ラセド。\n あなたが あの子が生きていると信じて\n 武器を 贈り続:
Yeah...Rasedo, because you believed he was
alive and kept giving him weapons.

120291.「今は ロゼフも 混乱しているようだが\n この先 何度か 顔を合わせていけば\:
Roseph may be a bit confused at the moment,
but I'm sure he'll remember us when he sees us
again and again.

120292.「……今度 あの子が 訪ねてくれる時には\n ロゼフの好物を たくさん作ってくる:
...I'll make Roseph's favorite food next time
he comes to visit. Looking forward to it,
Rasedo.

120293.「ああ……もちろんさ。\n 頼んだぜっ シェイン！: Yeah...of course. I'm counting on you, Shane!

120294.「<pc>！\n あんたにも いろいろ世話になったな。\n 心から 礼を言わせて:
<pc>! You've done a lot for me. I
thank you from the bottom of my heart. Thanks
a lot!

120295.「……そうそう。<pc>の作った\n <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>は すばら:
...yes, yes. The <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM> made by
<pc> was a wonderful work. It seems
you've become a craftsman on par with me.

120296.「あんたのウデは 超一流だ！ もちろん\n 成長のカベだって 超えられるだろう。:
Your skills are top-notch! Of course, you'll be able to surpass the barriers to growth. This is just a small token of my appreciation.
Please accept it!

120297.「これで あんたは 職人レベル５６以上に\n 成長できるはずだ。次の限界は レベ:
You should now be able to grow to craftsman
level 56 or above. The next limit is level 60,
so work your way up to even higher levels!

120298.「色々と 世話になったな。\n ありがとよ <pc>！:
You've taken care of a lot for me. Thanks
<pc>!

134941.「オレは 何も 怒っちゃいない。 \n だけど…… オレのことは\n しばらく:
I'm not angry about anything. But... please
leave me alone for a while.

202727.「……おいおい！？ あんたは すでに\n オレの解放できる限界を 超えてるじゃな:
Oh, come on! You've already exceeded the
limits of what I can release.

202728.「グランドマスターに 認められちまうとは\n さすがは <pc>だ。\n これか:
It's great to be recognized by the Grand
Master. Let's keep on making good things for
each other!
